text: @GavinNewsom We want to stay home but our leaders are not giving us the support we need to survive that economically!Freeze all mortgage, rent, bank debts (W/no debt accrued debt). Order all essential services to continue guaranty payrolls of essential services + #UBI monthly #COVID19
